price: ߘߊߦߟߌߡߍ ߘߌ߫ ߖߐ߲߭ ߠߎ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߸ ߊ߬ ߣߴߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ߘߎ߰ ߛߊ߬ߣߍ߲ ߟߊߣߌߡߦߊ߫ ߏ߬ ߟߊ߫ ، ߒ߬ߓߊ߬ ߓߐߟߌ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߏ߬ ߢߊ ߟߋ߬
arabic: رِّزۡقٗا لِّلۡعِبَادِۖ وَأَحۡيَيۡنَا بِهِۦ بَلۡدَةٗ مَّيۡتٗاۚ كَذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡخُرُوجُ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: riz'qan lil'ʿibādi wa-aḥyaynā bihi baldatan maytan kadhālika al-khurūju
